translation: On seeing Thee, touching the sky, shining in many colors, with mouths wide open, with large fiery eyes, I am terrified at heart and find neither courage nor peace, O Vishnu.
commentary: 11.24 touching the sky touching the sky? bright shining? Anekvarnam in many colours? vyattananam with mouths wide open? glowing giant eyes with larve fiery eyes? seeing having seen? Hi verily? You Thee? terrified at heart? patience courage? Not not? I find (I) find? Shamam peace? f and? Vishnu O Vishnu.Commentary Dhriti also means patience and strength. Sama also means control.The vision of the Cosmic Form has frightened Arjuna considerably.
